SELECT IA.QNA_SEQ, IA.CATE_CD, IA.QESTN_TITLE, IA.QESTN_TEXT_CONTENT, IA.QESTN_HTML_CONTENT, IA.QESTN_ATCH_FILE_ID, IA.READ_CNT,
CAST(AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(IA.EMAIL_ADDR),'BRC') as CHAR) AS EMAIL_ADDR IA.REG_DTTM AS USR_REG_DTTM, IA.REG_ID AS USR_REG_ID, IA.MOD_DTTM AS USR_MOD_DTTM, IA.MOD_ID AS USR_MOD_ID, IA.QNA_PROCESS_STUS_CD, IA.OPEN_YN, IB.QNA_ANSWER_SEQ, IB.WRTER_ID, IB.QNA_ANSWER_PASSWD, IB.ANSWER_TEXT_CONTENT, IB.ANSWER_HTML_CONTENT, IB.USE_YN, IB.ANSWER_ATCH_FILE_ID, IB.REG_DTTM, IB.REG_ID, IB.MOD_DTTM, IB.MOD_ID,
( SELECT CD_DESC1 FROM TB_SYS_COM_CD WHERE COM_CD = IA.CATE_CD ) AS CD_NM, CASE WHEN IA.SECRET_YN = 'Y' THEN '비공개' ELSE '공개' END AS OPEN_NM, IA.DEADLINE,
IA.DEADLINE_DATE FROM TB_COM_QNA_INFO IA LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_COM_QNA_INFO_REPLY IB ON IA.QNA_SEQ = IB.QNA_SEQ WHERE IA.OPEN_YN = 'Y' AND IA.QNA_SEQ = #{qnaSeq}

SELECT IMG_PATH, IMG_URL, IMG_NAME, IMG_SIZE, THUMBNAIL_IMG_PATH, THUMBNAIL_IMG_URL, THUMBNAIL_IMG_NAME, THUMBNAIL_IMG_SIZE FROM TB_COM_EDITOR_IMG WHERE BBS_SEQ = #{qnaSeq} AND BBS_CLS_CD = #{currentMenu} ORDER BY IMG_SEQ ASC
